name: Dolma Tibetan Silver Statement Bracelet
description:
This bracelet loves to be stacked! Made of Tibetan silver, these bracelets are substantial and luxurious- reminiscent of John Hardy and David Yurman at a fraction of the cost. 

Dolma in Tibetan means 'she who leads' or 'star'. So appropriate because we feel like we can do anything when we wear these bracelets. It doesn't hurt to get constant compliments as well! 

Comes in five styles. Order 3 or more for stacking.

Please refer to the chart to order by style

Model is wearing her bracelets with the following complimentary styles (also available in the pull down menu above)
- Kaisa Sterling Silver Basket Weave Ring
- Minoa Sterling Silver Serpent Ring
- Hope Tibetan Silver Necklace
- Hope Tibetan Silver Earrings

options.name: Minoa Sterling Serpent Ring - adjustable  R1532

name: Genuine Pearl Hair Pins
description:
Every Girl deserves to wear the real thing! These hair pins are genuine pearls measuring 9-10 mm. These come in sets of two displayed on a lovely merchandise card (shown).  

Come in blush pink or white pearls.

options.name: Pink Pearl Hair Pins Set of 2  A1035
White Pearl Hair Pins Set of 2  A1033

name: Avalon Sterling Silver Intertwining Earrings
description:
These earrings are featherlight and so full of movement. 

Constructed of .925 sterling silver. They measure approximately 2.5" long.

name: Confetti Pearl and Gemstone Rope Necklace
description:
80 inches of pure yumminess!  Creamy freshwater pearls with bright splashes of color provided by dozens of assorted gemstones. 

There are dozens of ways to wear this versatile piece using our unique convertible clasp (available in the pull down menu above)

name: Grace Pearl and Silver Mesh Princess Necklace
description:
This is perhaps one of the most complimentary silhouettes a woman can wear. Cultured fresh water pearls drape from an intertwining metal mesh necklace that is lightweight, adjustable in size and so pretty!

Also incredibly affordable. Ideal for bridesmaids gifts or just the right elegant accent for the bride. 

Pairs perfectly with our Misty Earrings (also available in the pull down menu above)

Approximately 16" adjustable to 18". Comes in natural colors of white, blush pink and midnight pearls.

options.name: Misty Pearl & Sterling Earrings White  E1239
Misty Pearl & Sterling Earrings Blush E1238
Misty Pearl & Sterling Earrings Midnight E1237

name: Viva Bracelet for Breast Cancer
description:
Polished pink jade adorned with a beautiful heart clasp. 

Dedicated to the fighters and survivors of Breast Cancer.  Ancient lore ascribes healing properties to Pink Jade, as well as the virtues of love, compassion and wisdom. A portion of the sales of this bracelet are donated to Breast Cancer research and treatment. 

Each bracelet is tagged with a pink ribbon and dedication. 

Try pairing this bracelet with our Alchemy post earrings in Pink Jade (in the pull down menu)

options.name: Alchemy Post Earring (sterling silver) Pink Jade

name: Hope Tibetan Earrings
description:
New!  Introducing the Hope Necklace--the newest member of our Tibetan Collection.  

Both necklace and earrings feature beautiful pendants made of Tibetan silver.  The necklace is on a sterling silver chain, and the earrings are on sterling silver french wire.

Looking for the perfect gift? Pair these wonderful earrings with our bestselling Hope or Indu Bracelets (both in the pull-down menu above)

About the artists...
In Beijing, China a growing population of disadvantaged women have fled Tibet and Western China to find education and safety for their children. These women survive by making jewelry and selling it on blankets in the streets and subway stations of the City. To help get these women and their children off the streets and realize their dream of prosperity for their families, Peace Love Bling has begun sourcing designs from them and funding education for their children.

This effort, called Zanta Re Ba (named after the woman who inspires us and the Tibetan word for ‘Hope’) grows through the purchases of their designs as well as charitable contributions.

Sales of Peace Love Bling designs also support U.S. based organizations that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Gatsby Glamour - Gaia Necklace and Earring Set / Gatsby Necklace
description:
Are you craving the glamorous looks of the Roaring 20s?  We have a number of vintage-inspired pieces that will help you channel a Jazz Age vibe.

The Gaia necklace and earring set is a fun and unique retro design.  Delicate hand-strung rice pearls dangle to create an eye-catching fringe pendant.

An extra long strand of pearls is a quintessential Jazz Age accessory, which is why we named our decadent 80-inch hand-knotted pearl strand the Gatsby.  Wear this piece long to channel the 20s, or use a convertible clasp to shorten or twist it for a versatile alternative.  The Gatsby comes in white and midnight, or get the best of both worlds with the black and white Coco Necklace.

Pair any of our pearl necklaces with the June, Essential, or Misty Earrings.

name: Carmen Earrings
description:
Colorful, exotic and completely unique. These embroidered satin earrings are lovingly made by women of the Miao minority of Southwest China known for their skills in embroidery and metal work. 

Available in 6 colors. Also a perfect compliment with our Vibe bracelets (also in the pull-down menu above). 

Sales of Peace Love Bling designs support U.S. based organizations that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Essential Earrings
description:
You can't get more timeless than the classic pearl stud earring.  These earrings are truly an essential item for any wardrobe.  

7 mm pearl stud on a sterling silver post.  Comes in three colors:  white, midnight, and blush.

name: Kaisa Sterling Basket Weave Ring
description: A stunning woven ring rendered in .925 sterling silver. And the best part? It's adjustable to fit everyone!

name: Minoa Sterling Silver Serpent Ring
description:
A stunning ring rendered in .925 sterling silver. And the best part? It's adjustable to fit everyone! 

Elegant, fluid snake serpent design.

name: Spark Cultured Pearl Necklace and Bracelet
description:
This modern interpretation of the classic pearl strand features a sparkling crystal magnet clasp.  Wear the necklace and bracelet separately or connect the magnetic clasps together to make one longer necklace.

Now available in white and blush.

Necklace approximately 18" and bracelet approximately 7.5".

name: Elegance Pearl Convertible Necklace and Bracelet
description:
Genuine pink, champagne, and white pearls create a beautiful rosy blush effect.  Perfect for both everyday and special occasions.  

Convertibles are empowered jewelry that allow you to wear each piece the way you want.  This 40-inch convertible necklace includes two strands and a removable clasp, so it can be worn long, short, twisted, or combined with other styles.

The Elegance Bracelet consists of five gorgeous strands of pink, champagne, and white pearls, bound with an attached clasp.

Pair the Elegance set with the Essential Earrings, June Earrings, or Misty Earrings.

Necklace and Bracelet sold separately.

name: Jewel Wing Necklace and Earrings
description:
Glistening between emerald and sapphire, these light feathery wings hail from the Sa Kaeo region of Thailand.  On necklaces, the feathery charm graces a black cotton cord.  The earrings float on sterling silver French wires.

Near the border of Thailand and Cambodia, at the end of the Jewel Beetle’s short life, these glistening beetles fall to the earth.  Local farmers collect the fallen beetles to create magnificent pieces of jewelry from their jewel-toned wings.
This work provides income for food, education, and healthcare for families living in a desperately underemployed region.

name: Alchemy Post Gemstone Earrings
description:
Classic post earrings in brightly polished natural stones.  

The Alchemy Earrings come in a rainbow of colors.  Choose from Amethyst, Black Onyx, Green Jade, Turquoise, and Red Coral.

7mm stones on sterling silver posts.

name: Prosperity Feng Shui Bracelets
description: Wishes for prosperity and abundance accompany these inspirational bracelets made from natural, colorful agate and Chinese Feng Shui coins. Approx. 7.5" Pair them with our new Prosperity Earrings (also in the pull down menu above) Sales of Peace Love Bling designs support U.S. based organizations that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Prosperity Feng Shui Earrings
description: The Feng Shui coins in these auspicious earrings are all about manifesting prosperity and abundance in your life. Pair these with our bestselling Prosperity Bracelets (also available in the pull-down menu above). About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for female artists while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Flounce Coin Pearl Earrings
description:
Elegant, charming earrings. Natural white coin pearls adorned with clear crystal and tiny natural seed pearls. 

Sterling silver french wires.

name: Liquid Luxe Necklace and Bracelet
description:
This sensuous blend of natural pearls and seed beads feels as luxuriant as she looks.  These multi-strand pieces are a glamorous addition to any wardrobe.

The necklace is approximately 18 inches with a magnetic crystal clasp.

name: Jolie Stretch Bracelets
description:
Fun and pretty stretch bracelet of genuine pearls punctuated by natural stones and crystal spacers. Looks great alone or stacked. Try mixing and matching with the Belle and Alchemy Bracelets.  

Approximately 7.5 inches.

All styles have white cultured freshwater pearls.

Available in green jade, onyx, turquoise, amethyst, clear quartz, rose quartz, lapis lazuli, red coral.

Even better when combined with Belle Stacking Bracelets in matching colors

name: Brooklyn Tibetan Cuff Bracelet
description:
A bold and beautiful cuff bracelet rendered in Tibetan Silver. Adjustable to fit everyone. 

Sales of Peace Love Bling designs support U.S. based organizations that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Posey Necklace
description:
Diverse natural stones encircle glittering brass charms to create this magnificent flower blossoming on a velvet cord.  The cord can be adjusted to any length; the pendant is 2-3 inches in diameter.

This piece, created outside Bangkok, Thailand and part of our Thai Treasures Collection, provides dignified income for rural women to support their families and provides education for their children.

name: Birkita Silver Pearl Necklace and Bracelet
description:
This set is so gorgeous you'll want to find an excuse to wear it every day.

Generous natural silver pearls layered on cotton cord. Bracelet and Necklace sold separately.

About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for female artists while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

description: Named for the goddess of the night, this bracelet simmers with genuine midnight pearls, amethyst and eclectic elements on memory wire. Flexible and adjustable to fit everyone. This bracelet perfectly compliments our Midnight convertible necklace. Both items are available in the pull-down menu above About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for female artists while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

Also has a matching bracelet or pairs wonderfully with our new Nyx Bracelet- a combination of midnight pearls, amethyst and eclectic elements on memory wire. Adjustable to fit everyone. (available in the pull down menu above) About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Adalia Luxury Shell Pearl Necklace Bracelet Earrings
description: Adalia is named for nobility. This set shines with just the right amount of crystal and South Sea shell pearls. The necklace is 20 inches long. The matching bracelet on memory wire adjusts to fit everyone. The earrings are genuine cultured pearls on sterling silver French wires. Each piece sold separately. Try pairing this set with our stunning Astra 8mm genuine pearl ring. Also adjustable to fit everyone.

name: Astra Pearl Ring
description: This adjustable ring shows off a genuine 8mm cultured freshwater pearl adorned with crystal. One size fits everyone. So affordable and chic. Pair it with our Stunning Adalia Bracelet for just the right touch of elegance and zing! (also available in the pull-down menu above)

name: Gatsby Luxurious 80 inch Natural Pearl Necklace
description: An heirloom piece... 80 inches of cultured pearls hand knotted with silk. This piece can be worn alone, or combined with other Peace Love Bling convertibles. Wear alone, or stack a pile of pearl rings for a dynamic effect.

Choose between Black Onyx, Amethyst, Green Jade, Turquoise, Red Coral, or White Pearl.

These cool earrings make a statement. Ethically handcrafted from brass and natural stones. Available in amethyst or white agate.

Approximately 2.5" long.

Regular price: $35; Sale price $10

name: Soho Lariat Necklace- Pearl Scarf
description: 'Soho' is so cool! These are 47 inches of natural pearls and stones that can be tied just like a scarf. They are so flexible and sturdy you can even knot them. You'll find so many unique ways to wear this piece... Loop it, tie it, belt it. Let it dangle down your back for an extra sexy look. Wear one, two or more together for different looks. Mix and match colors. Each pearl is individually hand knotted on silk. Available with amethyst, red coral, black agate, lapis lazuli (blue), green jade, rose quartz, turquoise, multi-stone, or all pearls. See the matching 'Soho' bracelets and earrings FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Solitaire Pearl and Sterling Silver Necklace
description: Sometimes simple is the most affirming statement of all. A beautifully cultured 10-11mm pearl slides luxuriously on a sterling silver box chain. 18 inches with a 2 inch adjustable chain. Available in midnight, lavender, pink and white. Try matching this with 'Essential' stud earrings, 'Cascade' earrings and our 'Lucky' bracelet FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Vortex Necklace
description: Circles of hammered sterling silver surround a precious natural coin pearl. Comes with an 18" sterling silver chain with a 2" extension. This is a unique and stunning piece you won't find anywhere else. Choose a white or black pearl. Comes in a complimentary gift box. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Blame it on Disco Necklace
description: Blame it on Disco is the only possible name for this necklace. Crystal, Crystal and more Crystal are enhanced with little dazzling disco balls. It's about 28 inches long. Now available only in black. Get in touch with your inner diva! About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. name: Rhapsody in Purple

The Posey Necklace, ethically handcrafted from natural stones and brass, can be tied to be worn long or short.

We paired this statement piece with Disco Earrings in purple and stacked Midnight Bracelets

All are available in the pull-down menu above

name: Devi Leather Ring
description:
<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF"> 'Devi' derived from Sanskrit means 'Goddess'.  We believe that as goddesses we are both feminine and strong. This ring combines the earthy strength of genuine leather with flirty, feminine stones and pearls. </FONT>

<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">Each ring is fully adjustable. Available in two styles. </font>

These rings are part of our Thai Treasures Collection. Made outside of Bangkok Thailand, these rings provide dignified income for rural women to support their families and provide education for their children.

name: Ganapati Lucky Elephant Bracelet
description:
In many cultures the elephant symbolically brings luck and removes obstacles. Let this charming, rustic bracelet be a reminder of your limitless possibilities. Tibetan silver. Adjustable to fit everyone.

Sales of Peace Love Bling designs support U.S. based organizations that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Prosperity Earrings

description: We found the most incredible natural stones to make this fantastic necklace. We have 5 styles: Amethyst- dramatic agate with veins of deep purple and gold coupled with rock candy amethyst accents. Black Agate: fabulous shapes to surprise and delight. Green Agate: this is an incredible stone! Deep emerald greens with goldenrod veins. Accented with Murano Glass details. Red Agate: deep and rich Turquoise: fabulous shapes. Combine with our matching earrings. Since these are hand cut, natural stones, no piece will be exactly the same. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

options.name: Blue agate with clear quartz crystal- New!

name: Magnolia Pearl Bracelet

<FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">A handcrafted flourishing flower of natural pearl and mother of pearl blossoms from an adjustable brass and waxed cotton band.  Although intended as a bracelet, we have seen brides use it as a hair adornment.</FONT>

In Beijing, China a growing population of disadvantaged women have fled Tibet and Western China to find education and safety for their children. These women survive by making jewelry and selling it on blankets in the streets and subway stations of the City. To help get these women and their children off the streets and realize their dream of prosperity for their families, Peace Love Bling has begun sourcing designs from them and funding education for their children. This effort, called Zanta Re Ba (named after the woman who inspires us and the Tibetan word for ‘Hope’) grows through the purchases of their designs as well as charitable contributions. name: Dakini Tibetan Bracelet
description: Dakini means 'Woman who dances in the sky' in Tibetan Buddhism. This wonderful cuff bracelet is made of Tibetan silver with turquoise and red coral colored beads. Available in 4 styles. Approximately 7.5" Artist profile: These bracelets are made by Tibetan migrant workers who have fled Tibet to find work and education for their children in Beijing. These disadvantaged women survive by making jewelry and selling it on the streets and crowded subway stations. Sales of these bracelets get them off the streets and helps to fund education for their children.

name: Puur-Fect Pearl and Cats Eye Convertible Necklace
description: Puur-Fect combines creamy natural pearls with festive pink cats-eye. The perfect accessory for spring! Peace Love Bling exclusive convertible necklaces are really several necklaces in one. With every convertible you get Two 40-inch strands of luscious natural pearls and stones along with a removable clasp. Wear the strands individually or together. Knot them or twist and drape them using the clasp. Try combining them with other Convertibles or with other necklaces you already have in your wardrobe. You can wear the same necklace everyday but look completely different. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

Strands and strands of natural pearls combined with silver chain and rhinestones make this a contemporary classic.  

This convertible necklace can be clasped or tied with ribbon for the latest fashion. Each necklace comes with both a clasp and ribbon. 

Approximately 18 inches when worn with the clasp.

name: Rio Necklace
description:
The bright, flirty natural stones in this necklace evoke the the sunny, carnival atmosphere of one of the World's most exciting cities. The only way to top this was to put it all together on a sensuous velvet cord.

Adjustable from 18 - 20 inches. All natural stones and Austrian crystal.

name: Poppy Ring
description: Dozens of natural pearls rock this ring! It's fabulous- Funky and affordable. Adjustable silver toned band. One size fits all. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Radiance Pearl Necklace
description: Three strands of floating natural pearls add just the right amount of rich style. An essential for an casual or formal wardrobe. These are so affordable! Try wearing more than one and combining colors. They are so pretty! 17 inches with a 2-inch adjustable chain. Available in pink, black, white. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Innocence necklace
description: The perfect accessory for all ages. Generous 6-7mm natural pearls on shimmery silk organza. The perfect necklace for all ages. An affordable and elegant bridal accessory. Also looks great with jeans and a t-shirt. 17 inches with a 2-inch extension chain. Combinations include white pearls on pink organza, white pearls on black organza, white pearls on white organza, black pearls on pink organza. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Bandit Necklace
description:
Bandit is sassy. One brilliant natural agate medallion on an antique chain.  It's so simple, yet so bold. 

Medallion is approximately 1.5 inches. Chain is adjustable from 15 to 20 inches. 

No two stones of this magnificent purple banded agate are alike. So it will be your own, unique, natural work of art.

Also shown with our popular Vibe Bracelet- Colors and purchase options are also in the pull-down menu above.

name: Soho Earring
description: Soho is the perfect splash of color with natural stones and pearls on sterling silver lever-backs. Matches perfectly with 'Soho' lariats and bracelets! Available in amethyst/pearl, black agate/pearl, black agate, red coral, red coral/pearl, turquoise, turquoise/pearl, lapis lazuli, lapis/pearl, green jade, jade/pearl. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Soho Stretch Bracelet
description: Three strands of seed pearls and bright, natural stones are uniquely knotted together for this clever stretch bracelet. The perfect match for our popular Soho lariat necklaces. Wear more than one for funky, chunky looks. Available in amethyst, green jade, black agate, red coral, lapis lazuli (blue), rose quartz (pink), turquoise and simply pearls. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Gaia Luxury Pearl Earrings and Necklace
description: Luxurious is an inadequate way to describe these ethereal pieces. Dainty rice pearls are hand strung to create the fringe pendants on the earrings and necklace. This is an affordable heirloom you'll want to treasure for generations. Earrings and necklace sold separately (see pull down menu above) Earrings are approximately 2.5 inches long. Sterling silver french wire. Necklace is 15 inches of cultured pearls (adjustable to 17 inches) with a 3 inch pendant. About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Disco Earrings
description: Fantastic, flirty, fabulous... Prepare to hear the full range of compliments when you wear these earrings. Handmade of polished sea shell dyed in happy colors. Sterling silver french wire. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Dottie Pearl Necklace
description: Fun and flirty mother of pearl and natural pearl necklace. Adjustable from 18 - 20 inches. Available in 2 colors - Midnight (SKU N1100) and White (N1099) A perfect set with Dottie earrings and Dottie Bracelet About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Dottie Pearl Earrings
description: The perfect every-day earring. Mother of Pearl shell surrounds a natural freshwater pearl. Sterling silver french wires. The perfect match for our Dottie necklace and bracelet. Available in White (SKU E1098) and Midnight(E1097) About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network.

name: Venus Bracelet
description: The centerpiece of this design is a natural mabe pearl cast in sterling silver surrounded by three strands of cultured 7-8mm pearls. Every single piece is a unique work or nature. 7.5 inches available in white or midnight pearls. This piece can be customized by size. Please contact us if you need this smaller or larger. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Alchemy Pearl Bracelet
description: Generous 6mm natural pearls with polished natural stones. Elegant alone and fabulous if you wear more than one. Approximately 7.75 inches. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Sonoma Necklace
description: Natural stones and pearls on leather. Pendent is 1.5 - 2 inches long. Necklace is approximately 18 inches. Toggle clasp. Available in 5 styles. About the artists: Peace Love Bling provides dignified, creative employment for women in China while funding education for their children. Proceeds from sales also support US causes that empower women including Dress for Success and the Ohio Domestic Violence Network. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Alchemy Earrings
description: Natural 8mm stones on sterling silver wire. Simple, sophisticated, essential! Available in rose quartz, turquoise, black agate, amethyst, tigers eye, lapis lazuli, green jade. See matching 'Alchemy Necklace' FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Removable Clasp
description: Use this clasp on Peace Love Bling convertible strands or on your own necklaces allowing you to wear them shorter without wrapping them around your neck. These clasps will help prolong the life of your longer necklaces and give you so many fashionable options. Approximately 3/4 inches wide. Silver plated FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Misty Earrings
description: Beautiful 7mm natural teardrop pearls on sterling silver lever back earrings. A more contemporary take on classic pearl earrings. Available in white, midnight, pink and lavender FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Uptown Necklace
description: The perfect necklace for everyday. 5-6mm cultured pearls on sterling silver box chain. Available in white, blush, or midnight pearls. This is also the perfect gift for your valentine, brides, the bridal party, graduates or any special woman in your life. This lovely necklace is 18 inches adjustable to 20. There is also a matching bracelet to complete the set. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Gift Bags and Boxes
description: Enhance your purchase with one of our bright and elegant gift bags or boxes. Colors vary. Please indicate in the a color or colors you would like in the comments section at checkout. We will do our best to accommodate. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Saturn Necklace
description: Natural mocha pearls and Austrian crystal are the constellations for the rich south sea shell pearl orbited by lustrous shell. This is a unique, fashionable accessory. 18 Inches. Please inquire if you need a smaller or larger size. Designed in the USA. Handmade by empowered women. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Judy Pearl and Crystal Necklace, Bracelet, and Earrings
description:
The Judy Necklace is a fabulous combination of five strands of pearls, shell pearls, and crystals.  The necklace can be worn clasped or with a ribbon (comes with both).

The Judy Bracelet has three strands of natural cultured pearls adorned with crystal bling. Finished with a magnetic crystal pave clasp.

The Judy earrings feature a matching rhinestone disco ball with a single lustrous pearl.  Sterling silver french wires.

Sold separately.

name: Natural Pearl Clip-on Earrings
description: The classic earring for those who like clip-ons or for little girls who don't have their ears pierced. Cultured 6mm freshwater pearls on Sterling silver clips. Available in midnight, blush and white pearls. If you are looking for clip-on earrings in other colors or styles, please inquire. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50

name: Tiffany Pearl Convertible Necklace
description:
Regular price $39.99

One strand of natural pearls with a removable clasp. 

Convertibles are empowered jewelry that allow you to wear each piece the way you want. Each convertible comes with ONE 40-inch strand of hand strung pearls and natural stones with a removable clasp. Twist strands and clasp them or wear them long. Wrap them around your wrist. Combine them with other pieces in your wardrobe, or... collect other Convertibles to make luscious combinations.

name: Lust Earrings
description:
Regular price $39.99

You don't just want these earrings, you need them. They are an essential for any wardrobe at an amazing price. Natural coin pearls on sterling silver French Wire. 

Available in white, midnight, silver, pink, and champagne. 


They are the perfect partner to the 'Eternal' bracelet, 'Luna', 'Envy' and 'Goddess' necklaces.

name: Kristin Pearl and Crystal Necklace, Bracelet, and Earrings
description:
Glamorously edgy twist of mirrored crystal and natural pearls.  The perfect combination of lustrous pearl and sparkly bling.  Bring her out for a special occasion or glam up a t-shirt and jeans with this gorgeous sparkler.

Sold Separately.

name: MagnetX Turquoise Magnetic Wrap
description: These have been a best seller for years! A 40 inch strand of natural hematite paired with Turquoise and red coral. Hematite is magnetic, so this strand will click together to hold any style you want- bracelet, choker, necklace, hairband, belt, anklet... your imagination is the only limit. This is the best definition of empowered jewelry. One strand fits everyone and let's you apply your own personal style. Available in dozens of colors. A suitable style for both men and women. FREE SHIPPING ON ALL ORDERS OVER $50
